code: @Override public boolean canConvert(@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") final Class type) {     return Instant.class.equals(type). }
@Override public Object fromString(final String value) {     return ZonedDateTime.parse(value, ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME).toInstant(). }

@Override public String toString(final Object value) {     if (value == null) {         return null.     }     final Instant instant = (Instant) value.     return ISO_OFFSET_DATE_TIME.format(instant.atZone(ZoneId.systemDefault())). }
